Name: Creepy Forest
About the game: Creepy Forest, a scary plot puzzle game, is full of strange things waiting for you to discover the truth on the mysterious mountain. You will manipulate the protagonist and uncover the long-standing horror story on the mountain; The whole plot is mainly decrypted, the puzzle design is moderately difficult, and it is closely combined with the plot, bringing an immersive experience.
